_header: Riseth up all Christs I-chosen leveneth in Our Father
Subjects: Bartholomew, bishop of Exeter; dreams; chronicles, verse in
_description: A tag heard in a dream by Bishop Bartholomew of Exeter (1161)

BLRoy14Cvii.Transcription:
Riseth op alle cristes icorneLeuenoth ure fader of þis wrold
                    fundeth
